title: Gorlex's Best of Epic Orchestra Music Compilations
description: A glorious recap of the past 6 months worth of my uploads. Presented in a "Mix style" instead of a compilation, which is why the upload is about a week later then usual. Out of the 128 songs I've uploaded in my Compilations, I was able to use 34 (with my limited ability to mix) and have it sound presentable. This is my first time attempting to mix orchestra music, so I hope you guys enjoy it :) Note: Some songs may be edited in terms of length or in some form for transitioning/mixing purposes, and thus may not be in their full form. Check my channel for other musical shenanigans | http://www.youtube.com/user/Iemdeath Facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Ha...
